price: او د موسى په قصه كې (هم نصيحت دى) كله مو چې له څرګند دليل سره فرعون ته ولېږلو.
arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wafī mūsā idh arsalnāhu ilā fir'ʿawna bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
